page.title: 09Micros in Landscove
page.content: We tried to find out how the developments in{science}and technology have affected people here.We were surprised to find that Mr.Hayllor's dairy cows wear a transponder around their necks like a collar.This gives a signal to a{computer}as the cows enter the milking parlour which in turn checks the{cows}yield of milk and adjusts the amount of processed food nutrients given in each case.This saves the farmer hours of time checking on the milk yield of his herd and also gives him a sort of health diagnosis for each animal. Most people own digital watches ,whose microprocessors keep time with uncanny accuracy.Many people have washing machines that are programmed for different washes.Radio alarms help the{farmer}get up early in the morning when most of us are in bed.
